#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <string>

using namespace std;

void displayString( string y ) {
	
	if( y.compare("8") == 0 )
		cout << "ate";
	else if( y.compare("w8") == 0 ) 
		cout << "wait";
	else if( y.compare("gr8") == 0 ) 
		cout << "great";
	else if( y.compare("4") == 0 ) 
		cout << "for";
	else if( y.compare("b4") == 0 ) 
		cout << "before";
	else
		cout << y;
}

int main() {
	
	int t, n, i;
	
	scanf("%d", &t );
	cin.ignore();
	
	while( t-- ) {
		
		string A, y;

		getline( cin, A );
		n = A.length();
		y = "";
		
		for( i = 0;i < n;i++ ) {
			
			if( A[ i ] != ' ' )
				y = y + A[ i ];
			else {
				
				displayString( y );
				cout << " ";
				y = "";
			}
		}
		
		displayString( y );
		cout << endl;
		
	}
	return 0;
}
